授業目的:
To examine theoretical and concrete issues in the field of multicultural society in relation to globalization

To understand the current social movement called globalization
To analyze and problematize the various issued in intercultural understating
To examine and to be able to explain the key concepts and the problems of multicultural societies in your own context
到達目標:
To examine and to be able to explain the key concepts and the problems of multicultural societies.
To analyze and problematize the various issues in education for intercultural understanding.
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法:
この科目は申込科目です。9/8～9/9の間に申し込みが必要です。
Students need to pre-apply for the course during 9/7～9/8.
